settings.subheading: To begin, what best describes you?

settings.title: Trade Customer
settings.text:
I am working or studying in the hair, beauty and/or makeup trade.

Trade qualiﬁcations are reviewed within 1 business day, in the interim, your status will be set to "trade pending”. Access to trade pricing and trade only items will become available when your status is conﬁrmed and set to "trade".

Further email updates will be sent to your nominated email address conﬁrming "trade pending" status and updating/verifying your "trade" status.

Additionally, upon verifying your "trade" status, a glamaCo Trade Card will be posted to you. This will allow you to receive unrestricted access to our full catalogue of items including trade only items, trade pricing, special trade offers and exclusive new release item updates at any glamaCo store location and online.

As a Trade customer, you receive:

Unrestricted access to our full catalogue of items including trade only items

Trade pricing

Special trade offers

Exclusive new release item updates

settings.title: Retail Customer
settings.text:
At glamaCo, we do sell to both public and Trade customers. There are some items that are only available to people in the Trade. If you are not in the Trade, you are of course still welcome to shop instore or online at glamaCo.

As a Retail customer, you receive:

Special deals and offers

Exclusive new release item updates
